dc_title_s: Metro Transit Bus Routes City of Madison, WI 2020
dc_description_s: This data represents Madison Metro Transit Bus Routes in the City of Madison, Wisconsin in 2020. [Metro Transit Bus Routes (simplified to one feature per route number). Developed from GTFS.]
dc_creator_sm: City of Madison - Metropolitan Planning Organization (MPO)
uw_supplemental_s: This is an archived copy of the data held at UW-Madison. For the most current data, please visit: https://data-cityofmadison.opendata.arcgis.com/
